page.title: 13RECREATION - (Motor)Cycling
page.content: Many people use Brierton Quarry as a place for riding motor cycles or BMX bikes.There are jumps,banks and sandpits which provide great enjoyment. Unfortunately the quarry is being spoiled by the dumping of rubbish. Last year a meeting was organised there by the Cleveland Motorcycle Club. Bricks and blocks of wood were laid down for manouvering and balancing tests. Each race included about twenty such tests. Youngsters ride BMX bikes in the quarry. It is good for these bikes because the jumps are smooth and the riders can go over very easily. Makes of BMX bikes found there include Mongoose, Wildcat and Burner.
